title: D-PLACE dataset derived from Binford 2001 'Constructing Frames of Reference'
description: The Binford Hunter-Gatherer dataset describes cultural practices for 339 hunter-gatherer groups. Approximately two-thirds of the societies described by Binford are also described in the Ethnographic Atlas. However, the Binford database includes a number of societies not in the Ethnographic Atlas, including many in Australia and northern North America.
citation: Binford, L. 2001. Constructing Frames of Reference: An Analytical Method for Archaeological Theory Building Using Hunter-gatherer and Environmental Data Sets. University of California Press
